name: Spellcaster
languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Magical Role
text: Choose a role for the spellcaster: healer or mage. Your choice determines which Spellcasting trait to use below.

trait.name: Spellcasting (Healer)
text: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Spellcasting (Mage)
text: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: guidance, sacred flame, cure wounds, fire bolt, light, sleep
